name: WsnycReAmaze

infos.name: Re:amaze Integration by WSNYC
infos.description:
Supercharge your customer support and engagement with the seamless integration of Shopware and Re:amaze. 


This powerful plugin enables you to effortlessly connect your Shopware store with Re:amaze's all-in-one customer service platform. With this integration, you can manage customer inquiries, provide real-time support, and automate responses to boost customer satisfaction. 


Streamline your customer service operations, access order information, and deliver personalized experiences to enhance your e-commerce success. Elevate your customer interactions and build lasting relationships with the this Re:amaze plugin!
infos.installationManual:
Plugin manual is available here.


Please sign up to Re:amaze platform before configuring the plugin.
infos.shortDescription: Supercharge your customer support and engagement integrating Shopware website with Re:amaze. Streamline customer service operations and deliver the best customer experience ever!
infos.highlights:
Seamless customer support: Effortlessly connect your Shopware store with Re:amaze's all-in-one customer service platform for streamlined customer support.
Real-time assistance: Provide instant, real-time support to customers with live chat, ensuring prompt resolution of their inquiries.
Automated responses: Automate responses to common customer queries, saving time and improving efficiency.
Unified inbox: Manage all customer communications from various channels, including email, chat, and social media, in one central inbox.
infos.features:
Live chat: Allows customers to engage with the Customer Service Team directly through the chat on the website.
Contacts: Information about Shopware customers can be available for the Customer Service Team directly through Re:amaze admin, without any additional actions on Shopware end.
FAQs: Allows to create and embed FAQs on Shopware sites. Also integrates well with the Shared Inbox, as customers can navigate and ask questions from the embedded FAQs.
Contact Forms: Allows for creating and embedding Contact Forms on Shopware sites. Also integrates well with the Shared Inbox, as Customer Support team can see if the questions are related to the Contact form.
